<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move the phi operands of Header from Latch out of AftBlocks to InsertLoc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="#a2d0f7c6e312d649719381f7e99424acd"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a2d0f7c6e312d649719381f7e99424acd">moveHeaderPhiOperandsToForeBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Header,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Latch,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> InsertLoc,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">                                              <a href="#a057b807fba588388e9dc4f414633b4e5">BasicBlockSet</a> &amp;AftBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to ensure we move the instructions in the correct order,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// starting with the earliest required instruction and moving forward.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#af765aa8813bb87e39b20ad124b06d64b">processHeaderPhiOperands</a>(Header, Latch, AftBlocks,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">                           &#91;&amp;AftBlocks, &amp;InsertLoc&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AftBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;moveBefore(InsertLoc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">                           &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  This method performs Unroll and Jam. For a simple loop like:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  for (i = ..)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">    Fore(i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">    for (j = ..)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">      SubLoop(i, j)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">    Aft(i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">  Instead of doing normal inner or outer unrolling, we do:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  for (i = .., i+=2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">    Fore(i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">    Fore(i+1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">    for (j = ..)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">      SubLoop(i, j)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">      SubLoop(i+1, j)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">    Aft(i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">    Aft(i+1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">  So the outer loop is essetially unrolled and then the inner loops are fused</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">  (&quot;jammed&quot;) together into a single loop. This can increase speed when there</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">  are loads in SubLoop that are invariant to i, as they become shared between</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">  the now jammed inner loops.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">  We do this by spliting the blocks in the loop into Fore, Subloop and Aft.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  Fore blocks are those before the inner loop, Aft are those after. Normal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  Unroll code is used to copy each of these sets of blocks and the results are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">  combined together into the final form above.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  isSafeToUnrollAndJam should be used prior to calling this to make sure the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">  unrolling will be valid. Checking profitablility is also advisable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  If EpilogueLoop is non-null, it receives the epilogue loop (if it was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">  necessary to create one and not fully unrolled).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8c861ddf753ab3690437dceaadf5c7e1">LoopUnrollResult</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae45123597a5abb30853572614c1b2d4b"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae45123597a5abb30853572614c1b2d4b">llvm::UnrollAndJamLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TripCount,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TripMultiple, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UnrollRemainder,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &#42;ORE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;&#42;EpilogueLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When we enter here we should have already checked that it is safe</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Alter the ForeBlocks phi&#39;s, pointing them at the latest version of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value from the previous iteration&#39;s phis</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;Phi : ForeBlocksFirst&#91;It&#93;-&gt;phis()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OldValue = Phi.getIncomingValueForBlock(AftBlocksLast&#91;It&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OldValue &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;should have incoming edge from Aft&#91;It&#93;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewValue = OldValue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PrevValue = PrevItValueMap&#91;OldValue&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">        NewValue = PrevValue;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Phi.getNumOperands() == 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">      Phi.setIncomingBlock(0, ForeBlocksLast&#91;It - 1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">      Phi.setIncomingValue(0, NewValue);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">      Phi.removeIncomingValue(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now that all the basic blocks for the unrolled iterations are in place,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// finish up connecting the blocks and phi nodes. At this point LastValueMap</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is the last unrolled iterations values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update Phis in BB from OldBB to point to NewBB and use the latest value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from LastValueMap</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;Phi : BB-&gt;phis()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> b = 0; b &lt; Phi.getNumIncomingValues(); ++b) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Phi.getIncomingBlock(b) == OldBB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;LastValue = LastValueMap&#91;OldValue&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">          Phi.setIncomingBlock(b, NewBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Backward dependencies are only preserved if not interleaved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sequentialized;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether it is semantically safe Src and Dst considering any potential</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dependency between them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// @param UnrollLevel The level of the loop being unrolled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// @param JamLevel    The level of the loop being jammed; if Src and Dst are on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// different levels, the outermost common loop counts as jammed level</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// @return true if is safe and false if there is a dependency violation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690" lineLink="#afa7cdefae294ca029d754def452709e9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#afa7cdefae294ca029d754def452709e9">checkDependency</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Src, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Dst,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UnrollLevel, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> JamLevel,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sequentialized, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp;DI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(UnrollLevel &lt;= JamLevel &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting JamLevel to be at least UnrollLevel&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src == Dst)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore Input dependencies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Src) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;LoadInst&gt;</a>(Dst))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether unroll-and-jam may violate a dependency.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// By construction, every dependency will be lexicographically non-negative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (if it was, it would violate the current execution order), such as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (0,0,&gt;,&#42;,&#42;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Unroll-and-jam changes the GT execution of two executions to the same</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iteration of the chosen unroll level. That is, a GT dependence becomes a GE</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dependence (or EQ, if we fully unrolled the loop) at the loop&#39;s position:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (0,0,&gt;=,&#42;,&#42;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now, the dependency is not necessarily non-negative anymore, i.e.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unroll-and-jam may violate correctness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Dependence&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = DI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo/#a49197b24cced248bed2d2c89c641a6dd">depends</a>(Src, Dst, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>-&gt;isOrdered() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected an output, flow or anti dep.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;  &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;Dst &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If outer levels (levels enclosing the loop being unroll-and-jammed) have a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854" lineLink="#a2d1ad27662c410b3adeb6e79e1606c97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;<a href="#a2d1ad27662c410b3adeb6e79e1606c97">getInnerMostLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!L-&gt;getSubLoops().empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> L;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02e1ff75cab81386059f88d395054b1c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02e1ff75cab81386059f88d395054b1c">llvm::isSafeToUnrollAndJam</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependenceinfo">DependenceInfo</a> &amp;DI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#a8bb1c6e90f84b4551595a8a1c27534bc">isEligibleLoopForm</a>(&#42;L)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Ineligible loop form\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42; We currently handle outer loops like this:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="comment">        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="comment">    ForeFirst    &lt;------\\   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="comment">     Blocks             |   &#125; ForeBlocks of L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="comment">    ForeLast            |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="comment">        |               |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="comment">       ...              |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="comment">        |               |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="comment">    ForeFirst    &lt;----\\ |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="comment">     Blocks           | |   &#125; ForeBlocks of a inner loop of L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="comment">    ForeLast          | |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="comment">        |             | |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="comment">    JamLoopFirst  &lt;\\  | |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="comment">     Blocks        |  | |   &#125; JamLoopBlocks of the innermost loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="comment">    JamLoopLast   -/  | |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="comment">        |             | |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="comment">    AftFirst          | |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="comment">     Blocks           | |   &#125; AftBlocks of a inner loop of L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="comment">    AftLast     ------/ |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="comment">        |               |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="comment">       ...              |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="comment">        |               |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="comment">    AftFirst            |   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="comment">     Blocks             |   &#125; AftBlocks of L</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="comment">    AftLast     --------/   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="comment">        |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="comment">    There are (theoretically) any number of blocks in ForeBlocks, SubLoopBlocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="comment">    and AftBlocks, providing that there is one edge from Fores to SubLoops,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="comment">    one edge from SubLoops to Afts and a single outer loop exit (from Afts).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="comment">    In practice we currently limit Aft blocks to a single block, and limit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="comment">    things further in the profitablility checks of the unroll and jam pass.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="comment">    Because of the way we rearrange basic blocks, we also require that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="comment">    the Fore blocks of L on all unrolled iterations are safe to move before the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="comment">    blocks of the direct child of L of all iterations. So we require that the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="comment">    phi node looping operands of ForeHeader can be moved to at least the end of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="comment">    ForeEnd, so that we can arrange cloned Fore Blocks before the subloop and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="comment">    match up Phi&#39;s correctly.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="comment">    i.e. The old order of blocks used to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="comment">           (F1)1 (F2)1 J1&#95;1 J1&#95;2 (A2)1 (A1)1 (F1)2 (F2)2 J2&#95;1 J2&#95;2 (A2)2 (A1)2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="comment">         It needs to be safe to transform this to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="comment">           (F1)1 (F1)2 (F2)1 (F2)2 J1&#95;1 J1&#95;2 J2&#95;1 J2&#95;2 (A2)1 (A2)2 (A1)1 (A1)2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="comment">    There are then a number of checks along the lines of no calls, no</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="comment">    exceptions, inner loop IV is consistent, etc. Note that for loops requiring</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="comment">    runtime unrolling, UnrollRuntimeLoopRemainder can also fail in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="comment">    UnrollAndJamLoop if the trip count cannot be easily calculated.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="comment">  &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Split blocks into Fore/SubLoop/Aft based on dominators</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;JamLoop = <a href="#a2d1ad27662c410b3adeb6e79e1606c97">getInnerMostLoop</a>(L);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a057b807fba588388e9dc4f414633b4e5">BasicBlockSet</a> SubLoopBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, BasicBlockSet&gt;</a> ForeBlocksMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;Loop &#42;, BasicBlockSet&gt;</a> AftBlocksMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#a855d933ff14db67cb1158c9829edd0bc">partitionOuterLoopBlocks</a>(&#42;L, &#42;JamLoop, SubLoopBlocks, ForeBlocksMap,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">                                AftBlocksMap, DT)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Incompatible loop layout\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Aft blocks may need to move instructions to fore blocks, which becomes more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// difficult if there are multiple (potentially conditionally executed)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks. For now we just exclude loops with multiple aft blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AftBlocksMap&#91;L&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() != 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Won&#39;t unroll-and-jam; Can&#39;t currently handle &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check inner loop backedge count is consistent on all iterations of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outer loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(L-&gt;getLoopsInPreorder(), &#91;&amp;SE&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;SubLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="normal">        return !hasIterationCountInvariantInParent(SubLoop, SE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
